name: EXCAVATION (andrewbarry1)
description:
As a miner for the extraterrestrial corporation MarsTek, you are left in an obscure sector of the planet with the vague objective of mining Marsium, a resource important to the survival of the human race. Unbeknownst to them, you brought friends.

itch.io builds are not typically kept updated (bugfixes, content) - visit http://andrewbarry.me/GameJam/Excavation
